description: You can customise this poke bowl recipe however you like. Here, we've added teriyaki and ginger salmon, avocado, cucumber and other tasty vegies.
name: Teriyaki Salmon Poke Bowl Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Divide rice between bowls and arrange lettuce, carrot, cucumber, avocado, nori, radish and flaked salmon around the bowls. Drizzle over any extra sauce from Bag & Bake bag and serve with pickled ginger and soy sauce.

Divide rice between bowls and arrange lettuce, carrot, cucumber, avocado, nori, radish and flaked salmon around the bowls. Drizzle over any extra sauce from Bag & Bake bag and serve with pickled ginger and soy sauce.
